title: Dexie database setup with all tables
description:
Set up Dexie.js for IndexedDB storage with all required tables.

File: src/db/index.ts

Tables needed:
- dogs (id, name)
- userSettings (id, activeDogId, recentTags, darkMode)
- namedLocations (id, dogId, name, lat, lng, radiusMeters)
- incidents (id, dogId, timestamp, trigger, intensity, + optional fields)
- departures (id, dogId, timestamp, duration, exitType, outcome, + optional fields)
- weeklyTargets (id, dogId, weekStart, targetDuration, notes)
- medicationConfigs (id, dogId, name, doses, notes)
- medicationEntries (id, dogId, date, medicationId, doseScheduleId, targetTime, actualTime, dose)

Index configuration:
- incidents: [dogId, timestamp]
- departures: [dogId, timestamp]
- medicationEntries: [dogId, date, medicationId]

Acceptance criteria:
- Dexie database initializes correctly
- All tables are queryable
- Indexes work for common queries

title: Reactivity Quick Log screen
description:
Implement the primary Quick Log interface for reactivity incidents per DESIGN.md.

File: src/components/Reactivity/QuickLog/

Components needed:
1. TriggerGrid.tsx - 6 trigger buttons (Dog, Person, Bike, Car, Noise, Other)
2. IntensitySlider.tsx - 1-5 intensity selector with labels
3. QuickLogScreen.tsx - Main screen composing the above

Flow (3 taps):
1. Tap trigger (required) - captures timestamp + GPS
2. Tap intensity (required)
3. Tap 'LOG IT' button

Data handling:
- Use nanoid() for incident ID
- Capture timestamp as ISO 8601
- Attempt geolocation capture (optional, fail gracefully)
- Save to Dexie incidents table

UI requirements:
- Touch-friendly buttons (min-h-11)
- Visual feedback on selection
- Success toast/feedback on log

Note: Details expander (behaviors, notes) is Phase 2

Acceptance criteria:
- Can log incident in 3 taps
- Incident saved to IndexedDB
- Works without location permission

title: TypeScript type definitions for all data models
description:
Create comprehensive TypeScript types for all data models as defined in DESIGN.md.

Files to create:
- src/types/index.ts (barrel export)
- src/types/reactivity.ts (Incident, TriggerType, DogBehavior, HandlerResponse)
- src/types/separationAnxiety.ts (Departure, WeeklyTarget, all SA-related types)
- src/types/medications.ts (MedicationConfig, DoseSchedule, MedicationEntry)
- src/types/common.ts (Dog, UserSettings, NamedLocation)

Key patterns:
- Use nanoid for ID generation
- ISO 8601 strings for timestamps
- Strict union types for enums (TriggerType, DogBehavior, etc.)

Acceptance criteria:
- All types from DESIGN.md are implemented
- Types are properly exported and usable throughout the app
- No 'any' types used
